attributes.action: Investigate shops showing reduced pricing on the shelf but not at checkout
attributes.background:
Many supermarkets show a reduced offer price on the shelf but at checkout the full price is charged. When challenged at checkout the
Lower price is checked manually but not put into the system so customers are being misled and have to keep and eye at checkout this is deceptive practice

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. 

If you are concerned about specific shops, you could ask for advice about this from the Trading Standards department at your local council.

If you want Parliament to change the law, you could start a new petition asking clearly for the specific change you would like.
